message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me at that price?

Hi Bob, I understand that $150 might be a bit out of your budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $125. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $125 is still a bit higher than I'd like to pay. I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Can you consider that price?

Hi Bob, I understand that $110 is still a bit higher than your target price. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $120. It's the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a fair price for this amazing product. What do you think?
